topics.title: Efficient Propeller Operation
topics.description: The speaker shows how small drone propellers operate more efficiently in hover mode on the vehicle, without needing different designs for hover and forward flight.
evidence_quotes: What's cool is that we now have small drone propellers operating much more efficiently
We can use the same propeller design for both flight modes

topics.title: Increasing Propeller Moment Arm
topics.description: The speaker explains how putting propellers farther out increases their moment arm, leading to less thrust required.
evidence_quotes: By putting the propellers farther out, we increase their moment arm
